page.description: Returns the data entry mode for a layout ( View, Change or Enter)

argument.name: Mode
argument.description: The current mode of the layout: "VIEW", "CHANGE", or "ENTER".

argument.name: layout_p
argument.description: A pointer to on open layout (form, browse, etc.).

page.discussion: The A5_GET_LAYOUT_MODE() function returns the mode ("VIEW", "CHANGE", or "ENTER") of the layout.
page.example: dim fp as P fp = form.load("Travel Time@c:\databases\travel time\travel time.ddd") ? a5_get_layout_mode(fp) = "VIEW"
